content.en: Fraud detection revolution: Researchers have been exploring the use of deep learning algorithms to improve credit card fraud detection in real-time. These algorithms, such as DLFD models, CNNs, and deep neural networks, are being used for automatic preprocessing, feature selection, bias elimination, and fraud visualization. Additionally, hybrid models combining different deep learning techniques, such as CNN-RNN and SpiHWO-based deep RNN, are being developed to enhance fraud detection in credit card transactions.
content.da: Revolution inden for bedrageridetektion: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af dybe læringsalgoritmer til at forbedre detektionen af kreditkortsvindel i realtid. Disse algoritmer, såsom DLFD-modeller, CNN'er og dybe neurale netværk, anvendes til automatisk forbehandling, trækvalg, fjernelse af bias og visualisering af svindel. Derudover udvikles hybride modeller, der kombinerer forskellige dybe læringsteknikker, såsom CNN-RNN og SpiHWO-baserede dybe RNN'er, for at forbedre detektionen af svindel i kreditkorttransaktioner.
